initial:
A button is connected to a html component using method:
Konekti.btn(id, icon='', caption='', onclick={'client':'client'}, style='w3-bar-item w3-xlarge', title='')
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the button
iconButton icon (Font Awesome)
captionButton text
onclickMethod to run when button is selected
styleButton style (w3css)
titleTooltip
